nan noun [C or U]
(BREAD)
a flat bread, typically eaten with South Asian food: Garnish with ginger and serve hot with nan or rice. Meals consisted mainly of rice, mutton, and naan. The curry was rich and creamy, perfect to dip the nan bread into. The serving platter can be set in the middle of the table along with basmati rice and some naan bread.
